rules.title: Contact and Plate Discipline
rules.why_template: Season strikeout rate is above target ({value:.3f} vs target <= {threshold:.3f}).

drills.name: Two-Strike Contact Ladder
drills.setup: Front toss, middle-away lanes, 2-strike count simulation.
drills.coaching_cues: Short path, quiet head, fight off close pitches.

drills.name: Take/Track Round
drills.setup: Coach toss from short distance; hitter tracks only.
drills.coaching_cues: Call ball/strike early, commit to zone boundaries.
drills.progression: Add mixed speed and edge locations.

drills.name: Choke-Up Contact Set
drills.setup: Tee plus front toss with reduced stride.
drills.coaching_cues: Barrel control first, intent through center field.

rules.title: Approach and Timing Reset
rules.why_template: Recent OPS is trending below season baseline ({value:.3f} delta).

drills.name: Early Timing Rounds
drills.setup: Machine or front toss, call timing cue before launch.
drills.coaching_cues: Get to ready position early, control gather tempo.

drills.name: Gap-to-Gap Sequencing
drills.setup: Alternating opposite-gap and pull-gap intent swings.
drills.coaching_cues: Stay through ball, match barrel path to pitch plane.

rules.title: Pop Time Efficiency
rules.why_template: Average pop time is above target ({value:.3f}s vs target <= {threshold:.3f}s).

drills.name: Knee-Down to Throw Series
drills.setup: Start from receiving stance, quick transfer to throw.
drills.coaching_cues: Direct hand path, eliminate extra gather.

drills.name: Foot Replacement Timing
drills.setup: Dry reps then short throws to second-base target net.
drills.coaching_cues: Right-left replacement in rhythm, keep shoulders level.

drills.name: Quick Exchange Challenge
drills.setup: Rapid-fire coach feeds with immediate exchange.
drills.coaching_cues: Glove-to-hand in one move, hands stay compact.

rules.title: Exchange Mechanics
rules.why_template: Exchange time is slower than target ({value:.3f}s vs target <= {threshold:.3f}s).

drills.name: Pocket-to-Release Reps
drills.setup: No throw dry work with stopwatch.
drills.coaching_cues: Receive softly, transfer directly to launch slot.
drills.progression: Add short throw every second rep.

drills.name: Rapid Transfer Ladder
drills.setup: Alternating feed heights and glove-side locations.
drills.coaching_cues: Quiet lower half, compact hand movement.
drills.progression: Reduce rep target time by 0.02s each round.

rules.title: Throw Accuracy and Release Path
rules.why_template: Caught-stealing rate is below target ({value:.3f} vs target >= {threshold:.3f}).

drills.name: Target-Line Throw Series
drills.setup: Second-base line target with taped lane.
drills.coaching_cues: Stay through target line, finish over front side.
drills.progression: Track percentage of throws in lane.

drills.name: Transfer + One-Hop Accuracy
drills.setup: Coach feeds, throw to chest-high net marker.
drills.coaching_cues: Consistent release slot, avoid arm drag.
